welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Knowsley, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning countryside. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited access in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is responsible for handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a wide range of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal at Manchester Airport, exclusively serving long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 4 hours per device.
